body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Noah Foster and the customer's name is Janet Lee.  The conversation is about Accounting Eagles (a Accounting Firm ) and is a conversation about billing.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! My name is Noah Foster and I'm with Accounting Eagles, how can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Noah, I'm Janet Lee. I'm having some issues with my recent bill.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for sharing that with me, Janet. I understand billing issues can be frustrating. Can you please provide me with your account number so I can look into this?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's one two three four five six.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Got it, thank you. Can I also ask for your date of birth to verify your identity?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Absolutely, it's September first, nineteen eighty-five.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Janet! Let me take a moment to review your bill.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I really hope this gets resolved quickly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand, and I appreciate your patience. I'm checking the details now.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It appears there was a clerical error in the billing. I will make sure to correct that for you right away.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Noah! That would really help me out.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Janet. Thank you for your time today. If you need any further assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a great day!
